mutant.name: AODS
mutant.shortDescription: Delete short-cut arithmetic operators
mutant.fullDescription: Deletes every occurrence of operators ++ and --

mutant.name: AODU
mutant.shortDescription: Delete basic unary arithmetic operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Deletes every occurrence of the unary operator -

mutant.name: AOIS
mutant.shortDescription: Insert short-cut arithmetic operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Insert operators ++ and -- on each variable and field

mutant.name: AOIU
mutant.shortDescription: Insert basic unary arithmetic operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Insert unary operator - on each arithmetic expression e.g : -(1+a); -1; -a; -(a.f)

mutant.name: AORB
mutant.shortDescription: Replace basic binary arithmetic operators with other binary arithmetic operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Replace each of the (*, /, %, +, -) operators in every binary expression with all of the others

mutant.name: AORS
mutant.shortDescription: Replace short-cut arithmetic operators with other unary arithmetic operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Replace each ocurrence of the operators ++ and -- with the opposite e.g : a++ => a--; a-- => a++

mutant.name: AORU
mutant.shortDescription: Replace basic unary arithmetic operators with other unary arithmetic operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Replace unary operators + and - with the opposite

mutant.name: ASRS
mutant.shortDescription: Replace short-cut assignment operators with other short-cut operators of the same kind
mutant.fullDescription: replace each occurrence of one of the assignment operators (+=, -+, *=, /=, %=, &=, |=, ^=, <<=, >>=, >>>=) by each of the other operators

mutant.name: COD
mutant.shortDescription: Delete unary conditional operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Deletes each occurrence of the ! operator

mutant.name: COI
mutant.shortDescription: Insert unary conditional operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Insert ! operator on variables, literals, binary and unary expressions

mutant.name: COR
mutant.shortDescription: Replace binary conditional operators with other binary conditional operators.
mutant.fullDescription: Replace each of the (&&, ||, &, |, ˆ) operators by each of the other operators

mutant.name: LOD
mutant.shortDescription: Delete unary logical operator
mutant.fullDescription: Deletes each occurrence of the ~ operator

mutant.name: LOI
mutant.shortDescription: Insert unary logical operator.
mutant.fullDescription: Insert the unary operator ~ on every arithmetic type expression

mutant.name: LOR
mutant.shortDescription: Replace binary logical operators with other binary logical operators
mutant.fullDescription: Replace each occurrence of the operators (&, |, ˆ) by each of the others

mutant.name: ROR
mutant.shortDescription: Replace relational operators with other relational operators, and replace the entire predicate with true and false.
mutant.fullDescription: Replace each occurrence of the operators (>, >=, <, <=, ==, !=) by each of the others it also replace binary expressions with true and false

mutant.name: SOR
mutant.shortDescription: Replace shift operators with other shift operators
mutant.fullDescription: Replace each occurrence of the operators (<<, >>, >>>) by each of the others

mutant.name: PRVOL
mutant.shortDescription: for each x = y expression it mutates x to compatible a, b and c expressions such that |x| == |a|, |x| + 1 == |b| and |x| - 1 == |c|
mutant.fullDescription: mutates an assignment expression x = y such that x is a list of one or more elements linked by . operator and for each element e in x, e will be removed or replaced with a, e.b and c.d; and for each e.f in x e.f will be replaced with e and g. The resulting list must be a valid expression and the type of the resulting list must be compatible with the type of the right hand side of the assignment.

mutant.name: PRVOL_SMART
mutant.shortDescription: the same as PRVOL but only uses reachable variables to make mutations
mutant.fullDescription: Same as PRVOL but when using local variables to replace elements the variables used are only the ones that are reachables from the statement being mutated

mutant.name: PRVOR
mutant.shortDescription: for each x = y expression it mutates y to compatible a, b and c expressions such that |y| == |a|, |y| < |b| and |y| > |c
mutant.fullDescription: mutates an assignment expression x = y such that y is a list of one or more elements linked by . operator and for each element e in y, e will be removed or replaced with a, e.b and c.d; and for each e.f in y e.f will be replaced with e and g. The resulting list must be a valid expression and the type of the resulting list must be compatible with the type of the left hand side of the assignment.

mutant.name: PRVOR_SMART
mutant.shortDescription: the same as PRVOR but only uses reachable variables to make mutations
mutant.fullDescription: Same as PRVOR but when using local variables to replace elements the variables used are only the ones that are reachables from the statement being mutated

mutant.name: PRVOR_REFINED
mutant.shortDescription: the same as PRVOR_SMART but it also uses Literals found inside the method to mutate and travels within expressions visited by PRVOR to apply PRVOR_REFINED
mutant.fullDescription: Same as PRVOR_SMART but it also uses Literals found inside the method to mutate and will inside BinaryExpressions, UnaryExpressions, MethodCall arguments, ArrayAccess index expression

mutant.name: PRVOU
mutant.shortDescription: for each return x and variable declarator with x as initializer it mutates x to compatible a, b and c expressions such that |x| == |a|, |x| < |b| and |x| > |c|
mutant.fullDescription: mutates a return expression return x such that x is a list of one or more elements linked by . operator and for each element e in x, e will be removed or replaced with a, e.b and c.d; and for each e.f in x e.f will be replaced with e and g. The resulting list must be a valid expression and the type of the resulting list must be compatible with the return type of the method.

mutant.name: PRVOU_SMART
mutant.shortDescription: the same as PRVOU but only uses reachable variables to make mutations
mutant.fullDescription: Same as PRVOU but when using local variables to replace elements the variables used are only the ones that are reachables from the statement being mutated

mutant.name: PRVOU_REFINED
mutant.shortDescription: the same as PRVOU_SMART but it also uses Literals found inside the method to mutate and travels within expressions visited by PRVOU (incuding if, while and for initialization (only if initialization declares a new variable)) to apply PRVOU_REFINED
mutant.fullDescription: Same as PRVOU_SMART but it also uses Literals found inside the method to mutate and will inside BinaryExpressions, UnaryExpressions, MethodCall arguments, ArrayAccess index expression

mutant.name: AMC
mutant.shortDescription: changes the access modifier of methods and class fields
mutant.fullDescription: replace (public|private|protected|<none>) access modifiers of methods and class fields with all of the others

mutant.name: IHI
mutant.shortDescription: hide inherited fields
mutant.fullDescription: add all inherited public fields and all inherited protected fields that are used in the class to mutate

mutant.name: EMM
mutant.shortDescription: change a setter for anothe setter
mutant.fullDescription: change a setter with all other setters whos parameters are compatible with the original

mutant.name: EOA
mutant.shortDescription: replace e1 = e2 with e1 = (e2).clone()
mutant.fullDescription: replace right hand expression (e) on AssignmentExpression and VariableDeclarator with (e).clone() only if e have a declared clone() method other than Object#clone(), it also add cast if needed

mutant.name: EOA_DUMB
mutant.shortDescription: replace e1 = e2 with e1 = (e2).clone()
mutant.fullDescription: replace right hand expression (e) on AssignmentExpression and VariableDeclarator with (e).clone()

mutant.name: EOA_STRICT
mutant.shortDescription: replace e1 = e2 with e1 = (e2).clone()
mutant.fullDescription: replace right hand expression (e) on AssignmentExpression and VariableDeclarator with (e).clone() only if e have a declared clone() method other than Object#clone() and e.clone() must be of the same type as the left hand side of the assignment

mutant.name: EOC
mutant.shortDescription: change == for equals
mutant.fullDescription: replace any expression e1 == e2 for e1.equals(e2) where e1 is not primitive and have equals method

mutant.name: IHD
mutant.shortDescription: unhide inherited fields
mutant.fullDescription: delete all fields that are inherited

mutant.name: IPC
mutant.shortDescription: deletes super constructor invocations
mutant.fullDescription: On ConstructorDeclararions, if there's a super ConstructorInvocations with one or more parameters then this invocation is deleted

mutant.name: ISI
mutant.shortDescription: adds super to Variable, FieldAccess and MethodCall, without doing any checks
mutant.fullDescription: for every (Variable, FieldAccess and MethodCall) this will add super infront

mutant.name: ISI_SMART
mutant.shortDescription: adds super to Variable, FieldAccess and MethodCall
mutant.fullDescription: for every (Variable, FieldAccess and MethodCall) this will add super infront when valid

mutant.name: ISD
mutant.shortDescription: deletes each occurrence of super on field and method calls
mutant.fullDescription: for every expression super.x it mutates to x, even if x is not visible (for example there's no x variable)

mutant.name: ISD_SMART
mutant.shortDescription: ISD but only deletes super when the remaining expression is valid
mutant.fullDescription: for each expression super.x, if x exists on it's own then it mutates to x

mutant.name: EAM
mutant.shortDescription: replace a getter with another one
mutant.fullDescription: mutates every getXYZ(params) with every other getYWZ(params') such that the return types are compatibles and params is compatible with params'

mutant.name: IOD
mutant.shortDescription: Deletes overriding methods
mutant.fullDescription: Deletes each method that overrides a parent method declaration

mutant.name: IOP
mutant.shortDescription: moves calls to a parent method inside the overriding child method
mutant.fullDescription: for every super.method call inside overriding method's block moves super.method call to first and last line and to previous and next line

mutant.name: JDC
mutant.shortDescription: deletes constructors default constructor
mutant.fullDescription: if a class have a constructor with no parameters then this will remove that constructor

mutant.name: JID
mutant.shortDescription: removes class fields initializers
mutant.fullDescription: for every field f = X it mutates to f only if it doesn't have the final modifier

mutant.name: JSD
mutant.shortDescription: deletes static modifier
mutant.fullDescription: mutates field and method declarations so that if they are static the mutants are not

mutant.name: JSI
mutant.shortDescription: insert static modifier
mutant.fullDescription: mutates field and method declarations so that if they are not static the mutants are

mutant.name: JTD
mutant.shortDescription: deletes this
mutant.fullDescription: mutates every this.x expression to x

mutant.name: JTI
mutant.shortDescription: inserts this before variables
mutant.fullDescription: mutates a var to this.var

mutant.name: JTI_SMART
mutant.shortDescription: inserts this before variables only if there's a field with the same name and type
mutant.fullDescription: mutates a var to this.var only if there's a reachable field with the same name and type as var

mutant.name: OAN
mutant.shortDescription: replace method calls with overriding method calls with compatible arguments, using strict type comparison
mutant.fullDescription: replace f(args) with f(args') such that args is (args', xs), each argument in args' is the same type as the corresponding one in args

mutant.name: OAN_RELAXED
mutant.shortDescription: replace method calls with overriding method calls with compatible arguments
mutant.fullDescription: replace f(args) with f(args') such that args is (args', xs), each argument in args' has a type compatible with the corresponding one in args

mutant.name: PCC
mutant.shortDescription: Mutates a cast to use the superclass of the original type
mutant.fullDescription: Mutates (T) exp to (T') exp where T' is the direct superclass of T
mutant.developerNotes: Could be used to modify initializers of class atributes

mutant.name: PCD
mutant.shortDescription: Deletes cast on expressions
mutant.fullDescription: mutates "(T) exp" to "exp"
mutant.developerNotes: Could be used to modify initializers of class atributes

mutant.name: PCI
mutant.shortDescription: Add a cast to object references
mutant.fullDescription: given an object reference o this will generate (P)o and (C)o where P is a Parent class of o and C is a Child class of o
mutant.developerNotes: Could be used to modify initializers of class atributes

mutant.name: PMD
mutant.shortDescription: change type of variables and fields to the parents type
mutant.fullDescription: mutates T a in variables and fields to P a where T inherits from P

mutant.name: PNC
mutant.shortDescription: changes an allocation expression to use the Childs constructor
mutant.fullDescription: given an allocation expression Parent o = new Parent(args) this generates Parent o = new Child(args)

mutant.name: OMR
mutant.shortDescription: change the body of a method with the body of another with the same name
mutant.fullDescription: mutates <modifiers> <return type> m(<params>) <body> with <modifiers> <return type> m(<params>) <body'> such that body' belongs to another method named m

mutant.name: PPD
mutant.shortDescription: change type of method parameters to the parents type
mutant.fullDescription: mutates T a in methods parameters to P a where T inherits from P

mutant.name: NPER
mutant.shortDescription: repairs NullPointerExceptions
mutant.fullDescription: Adds try catch to code that produce NullPointerException (this operator was produces as a task in an ECI course)

mutant.name: BEE
mutant.shortDescription: Boolean Expression Extender
mutant.fullDescription: recursively adds op E to any boolean expression (Variable, FieldAccess, MethodCall, UnaryExpression, BinaryExpression)

mutant.name: CRCR
mutant.shortDescription: CRCR operator from PIT (rv)
mutant.fullDescription: from a constant c generates 1, 0, -1, -c, c + 1, and c - 1
